pullrequest.title: Prevent GUI from jumping around, pixel saving, analysis submission improvements

content.raw: It looks like that's what you would have gotten before my changes, but I've fixed it anyway - now that status is written from the exception handler rather than from the `if error condition:` block, so it will not overwrite the 'error in transition to manual' status.
content.html: It looks like that's what you would have gotten before my changes, but I've fixed it anyway - now that status is written from the exception handler rather than from the if error condition: block, so it will not overwrite the 'error in transition to manual' status.
